long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WikiVix is a modern modified Wikipedia. 
The new updated interface allows you to change the content of Wikipedia. 
- set the page width according to your convenience
-adjust the font size 
-enable and disable the dark theme at will
-all images can be scaled
